text: Daylight Records is an American record label. It is part of the Sony Music Entertainment group. It was started by David Massey. == Current artists == * Good Charlotte * Cheyenne Kimball * Cyndi Lauper * Soshy * Chris Wallum == Previous artists == * Anastacia * The Daylights * Delta Goodrem * Jonas Brothers * mc chris * Phantom Planet * Daniel Powter ==Related pages== * List of record labels == Other websites == * Daylight Records â€“ Official website Category:American record labels Category:2000 establishments in the United States
title: Daylight Records
